content:
On Monday Aug PERIOD  classes will begin for the first time at the Texas AM University School of Law in Fort Worth Texas PERIOD Texas AM University System Chancellor John Sharp announced the finalization of the universitys acquisition of the law school on Tuesday which previously operated as part of the Texas Wesleyan University system for the last  years PERIOD

In a university press release Sharp said Texas AM will pay a total of . million for the law school over the next five years with an option to purchase the land the school sits on PERIOD A previous deal discussed by the two schools would have resulted in the  and cost Texas AM approximately  million PERIOD

The law school is one of nine in the state of Texas PERIOD In a press release Texas AM President R PERIOD Bowen Loftin said the addition of a law school to the system is another step to achieving the goals of  which includes plans to mold the university into a leading institution among its public university peers PERIOD

 Loftin said PERIOD

The law school will enhance the education and opportunities at the university Sharp said in the press release but Texas AMs status as a communityoriented land grant university will also benefit the state as a whole PERIOD

 Sharp said PERIOD 

The university received final approval by the American Bar Association on Aug PERIOD  Texas AM Provost and Executive Vice President for Academic Affairs Karan Watson said in the press release PERIOD The transition from the Wesleyan system to AMs will be as positive for students and faculty as possible she said PERIOD

 Watson said 

To assist with the transition the university has created a website with information on identification finances and recent news PERIOD
